text: A Florida man is accused of breaking into Taylor Swift's New York City home and taking a nap. ( Published Friday, April 20, 2018 ) What to Know A Florida man has been accused of breaking into Taylor Swift's SoHo townhouse and taking a shower and nap, sources say He was arrested on trespassing, stalking and burglary charges ; he was also reportedly cuffed outside the home in February It was the fourth time in three weeks a man was cuffed at one of the ` ` I Knew You Were Trouble'' singer's properties. A Florida man is accused of breaking into Taylor Swift's New York City home and taking a nap. Police sources tell News 4 the man also allegedly took a shower and disturbed the pop star's bed after climbing through a window at her So
